casebody.data:
Joseph CAPUTO v. PENNSYLVANIA R. CO., Appellant. No. 9427. United States Court of Appeals Third Circuit. Argued Jan. 8, 1948. Reargued Oct. 8, 1948. Decided Oct. 26, 1948. Philip Price, of Philadelphia, Pa. (J. Peter Williams and Barnes, Dechert, Price, Smith & Qark, all of Philadelphia, Pa., on the brief), for appellant. Joseph S. Lord, 3d, of Philadelphia, Pa. (Richter, Lord & Farage, of Philadelphia, Pa., on the brief), for appellee.

Before BIGGS, Chief Judge, and MARIS, Goodrich, ' McLaughlin o’con-NELL, and KALODNER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed by an equally divided court.
